name: Phonk Cats
description:
This game is a rhythm game in which cats dance to phonk.


Each card in the game has its own level of difficulty. For passing the map you get points and cash, which you can spend on customizing your cats.

Game features:
  • Cat customization
  • Different mods that greatly change the game experience.
  • Ability to play both alone and against your friend.
  • Lots of different phonk tracks you're sure to enjoy
  • Cool cats!

Hurry up and enter the world of beautiful phonk, you won't want to leave it!
